name: Daisy Delight
description: Brighten your quilt with this charming pattern featuring daisies, stems, and leaves. Perfect for spring projects, it adds a touch of nature's beauty to any quilt.

name: Ode to Antique Rosettes
description: In hues of old, rosettes unfold, Stitches tell stories, histories retold. Petals and threads, crafted with care, Antique rosettes, beyond compare.

name: Rhombus and Triangles
description: This quilt pattern combines plain rhombus and triangles to create a striking geometric design. Perfect for modern and minimalist quilt projects, it brings clean lines and dynamic shapes to your handmade creation.

name: Highway Lines
description: Zoom down the quilt with lines so straight, A highway design that is simply great. With roads and lanes, it is sure to impress, This pattern is a journey to quilting success

name: Heartfelt
description: Craft your quilt with love using this heartfelt pattern. Charming hearts scattered across the fabric create a warm and affectionate design, perfect for adding a touch of tenderness to any quilt.

name: Not A Paisley
description: A playful twist on the classic paisley shape. Perfect for adding a modern and unexpected touch to your quilt.

name: Swirly Gig
description: Dive into a quilt adorned with swirly gigs that swoop like ocean waves, forming elegant shell shapes. Perfect for adding a touch of whimsy and flow to your design

name: Linear Leaves
description: This pattern showcases a repeated arrangement of straightforward leaves. Perfect for adding a touch of natureâ€™s simplicity to your quilts, this design brings a clean and structured elegance to any project.

name: Bunny Hop
description: Bounce into cuteness with this Bunny Hop pattern. Adorable bunnies in a repeated design add a playful and charming touch to any quilt

name: Retro-spective
description: Featuring straight lines intersected by circles, this design brings a nostalgic yet modern touch to your quilts, perfect for adding a dynamic and playful flair.

name: Ponytail Silhouette
description: Featuring the bust of a girl in silhouette, complete with a stylish ponytail. This pattern adds a touch of whimsey and sophistication to any tween quilt.

name: Cartoon Clouds
description: Add a playful touch to your quilt with this Cartoon Clouds pattern. Whimsical and fun, these fluffy clouds bring cheer to any project

name: Butterfly Essence
description: Delight in this enchanting Butterfly Essence pattern. Featuring elegant shapes that evoke the beauty of butterflies, this design adds a touch of grace and whimsy to any quilt.

name: I Heart Vintage
description: Combine nostalgia and love with this Vintage Hearts Mashup pattern. Featuring a charming blend of antique designs and heart motifs, this pattern adds a rich, romantic touch to any quilt.

name: Busy Vintage
description: Featuring intricate, bustling designs, this pattern adds a rich, historical touch to your quilt, perfect for creating a timeless treasure.
